description.ko: 소리의 기하학을 탐구하는 시각적 여정으로, 보이지 않는 주파수를 역동적이고 흐르는 구조와 리드미컬한 빛의 패턴으로 구현하여 청각과 시각적 지각 사이의 간극을 메웁니다.
description.en: A visual journey into the geometry of sound, where invisible frequencies manifest as dynamic, flowing structures and rhythmic light patterns, bridging the gap between auditory and visual perception.

prompt: Cinematic abstract sound visualization, 3D fluid waveforms oscillating in a dark void, pulsating concentric circles of light, neon cyan and deep magenta gradients, kinetic particle systems reacting to bass frequencies, high-speed motion blur, futuristic digital interface aesthetic, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic lighting.
